des: "Asian-style green beans with lots of flavor! This recipe is made for a large party; but can be scaled down for a family dinner.  Serve cold or warm."
ins: In a large wok, heat oil over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans; cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger; cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Continue cooking until green beans are tender.
